text.section: All license, permit, and certificate fees, charges, fines, and other moneys collected by the board under the provisions of this chapter, and the administrative regulations of the board, shall be deposited into the State Treasury and credited to a trust and agency fund to be used by the board in carrying out the provisions of this chapter, and are hereby appropriated for those purposes.
Notwithstanding KRS 45.229, any moneys remaining in the fund at the close of the fiscal year shall not lapse but shall be carried forward into the succeeding fiscal year.

law.history: Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 73, sec. 14, effective July 12, 2012. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 257, sec. 22, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 191, sec. 18, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 260, sec. 11.
